abilities.desc: At the start and end of your turn, each enemy within range must pay 1 HP, then gain 1 Weakness token.
abilities.trigger: at the start and end of your turn

actions.name: Build Pressure
actions.desc: Give an enemy within range 1 each of three different Status tokens of your choice (Burning, Challenge, Fatigue, or Weakness).

actions.name: Apply Pressure
actions.desc:
Target an enemy within range. Deal damage to them equal to the number of Status tokens they hold, to a max of 12 damage.
Usable once per turn.
